string.name: title_activity_main
string.i: ...the culling is nigh, prepare for Him.

resources.string:
Welcome to CatFarts, maggot. Your orders are simple: 
 
 1.) Neutralize the 'Fart!' button 
 2.) Enjoy feline image and fart noise 
 3.) Repeat steps 1 and 2 until happiness is attained. 


 Good Luck, Soldier!

CatFarts is:
